_id.description: Unique identifier automatically generated by MongoDB.

userId.description: Custom user ID used to identify the user in the system.

email.description: Email address of the user. Must be unique.

role.description: Defines the user’s role in the platform (either 'student' or 'instructor').

joinedAt.description: Date when the user joined the platform.

bio.description: Short biography or description about the user.

avatar.description: URL to the user’s avatar or profile image.

skills.description: List of skills associated with the user.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the user account is active (true) or deactivated (false).

updatedAt.description: Date when the user’s record was last updated.

description: Schema definition for the Users collection.
